docs.snippet: YouTube is testing a messaging feature in its smartphone app so people can share and discuss videos without resorting to other ways to connect with their friends and family....
docs.lead_paragraph: YouTube is testing a messaging feature in its smartphone app so people can share and discuss videos without resorting to other ways to connect with their friends and family.

headline.main: YouTube Tests Messaging Feature to Keep People in Its App

docs.snippet: Japanese electronics and entertainment company Sony Corp. reported Thursday an 84 percent profit drop in October-December, as losses in its movie division offset healthy results in its video game business....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japanese electronics and entertainment company Sony Corp. reported Thursday an 84 percent profit drop in October-December, as losses in its movie division offset healthy results in its video game business.

headline.main: Sony Records 84 Pct Quarterly Profit Drop on Movie Loss
headline.print_headline: Sony Records 84 Pct Quarterly Profit Drop on Movie Loss
